metadata.title: CVE-2019-11472 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - low
metadata.description:
ReadXWDImage in coders/xwd.c in the XWD image parsing component ofImageMagick 7.0.8-41 Q16 allows attackers to cause a denial-of-service(divide-by-zero error) by crafting an XWD image file in which the headerindicates neither LSB first nor MSB first.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-11472` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

imagemagick - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
imagemagick-6-common - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
imagemagick-6.q16 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
imagemagick-6.q16hdri - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
libimage-magick-perl - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
libimage-magick-q16-perl - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
libimage-magick-q16hdri-perl - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
libmagick++-6-headers - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
libmagick++-6.q16-9t64 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
libmagick++-6.q16hdri-9t64 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
libmagickcore-6-arch-config - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
libmagickcore-6-headers - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
libmagickcore-6.q16-7-extra - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
libmagickcore-6.q16-7t64 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-7-extra - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-7t64 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
libmagickwand-6-headers - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
libmagickwand-6.q16-7t64 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
libmagickwand-6.q16hdri-7t64 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
perlmagick - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in oracular was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu2').
